alert.note: Alert for East Becker; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 28 at 2:48PM CDT until May 02 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central Minnesota and northwest Minnesota, including the following areas, in north central Minnesota, Hubbard, Lake Of The Woods, North Beltrami and South Beltrami. In northwest Minnesota, East Becker, North Clearwater and South Clearwater. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Ongoing flooding as a result of the last two weeks of precipitation has primed soils for further flooding. Widespread rainfall is expected to begin Friday morning and overspread the area Friday afternoon. While rain rates are not anticipated to be as high as last weekends event, prolonged moderate rainfall could cause flooding issues in regions that are saturated. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; Hubbard; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; South Beltrami; South Clearwater
